title: JSON schema for SKY UX CLI skyuxconfig.json

url.description: Fully qualified URL of the file.

head.description: Inject in the head versus before the closing body tag.

app.description: Specifies configuration options for the local app when running skyux serve

externals.description: Dynamically injects CSS and JavaScript files into SKY UX Host. You should have a specific use-case for an externals and they must be white-listed by the SKY UX team.

before.description: CSS files to inject before default SKY UX files.

after.description: CSS files to inject after default SKY UX files.

before.description: JS files to inject before default SKY UX files.

after.description: JS files to inject before default SKY UX files.

codeCoverageThreshold.description: Specifies the minimum required code coverage threshold.

host.description: Blackbaud Only - Specifies configuration options for communication with SKY UX Host.

url.description: Specifies a base URL to pass information from skyux serve to the SKY UX Host.
